Blogs.entry_title: Top Fruit Safety Tips You Should Be Swearing By Every Time You Consume Them .
Blogs.entry_content: Fresh fruits bring with them a horde of health benefits, but it’s the way we consume them that is more important. While fruits have the ability to prevent many diseases such as cancer, heart stroke,...
Blogs.text: Fresh fruits bring with them a horde of health benefits, but it’s the way we consume them that is more important. While fruits have the ability to prevent many diseases such as cancer, heart stroke, not washing them properly can give rise to a number of health problems that might turn into deadly diseases. So we bring to you some top fruit safety tips that will come in handy every time you sit down to consume them.
Blogs.li1: Pick produce that is not bruised or spoiled. Any opening in the fruit is actually a haven for pathogenic bacteria during the transit.
Blogs.li2: Fruits that are spiralized or pre-cut must be refrigerated or should be stored in the refrigerator! If you really need to buy pre-cut fruits, be sure to refrigerate them right after you cut them.
Blogs.li3: Ensure that you separate fruits from raw meat, poultry, and seafood in the shopping cart, in the grocery bags, and in the kitchen.
Blogs.li4: Clean all the fruits before cutting or eating. Don’t wash them in case of packaged fruits, where the packaging says the contents have been washed.
Blogs.li5: Keep the fruits inside the packet in which it was bought from the vendor. Further, the packet should be kept in an isolated place for some time before it can be brought into use.
Blogs.li6: In case of some fruits where you the peel are not eaten, thoroughly rinse produce under running water so that the germs do not get inside the surface when you cut or eat them.
Blogs.li7: Cut the fruits as close as possible to the time you’ll be consuming them.
Blogs.li8: Make sure to use a sharp cutting knife, and clean it well before cutting the fruits.
Blogs.li9: Refrigerate fruits you have cut or peeled within 2 hours (or 1 hour if the room temperature is 90°or warmer). Chill them at 40°F or colder in a clean container.
Blogs.li10: Do not use disinfecting sprays, cleaning wipes or soap on fresh produce, as this can harm its quality and the nutrients the fruit has to offer. Only fresh water should be used in the cleaning of fresh fruits.

all-fruits.name: Kimaye Dasheri Mangoes (Pack of 3,6 &12)
all-fruits.description: Dasheri mangoes are long and oval shaped, with light green to yellow-green skin and turn golden yellow on ripening. Dasheri mangoes have a light yellow colored flesh with a medium-sized stone. This Mango variety is known for its very sweet and aromatic flavor.

all-fruits.name: Kimaye Cherry- Blueberry Combo
all-fruits.description: What do you call a Combo which has both Blueberries and Cherries? Delicious right? This combo is a mix of two of our personal favourites and Kimaye Cherries and Blueberries. This is sure to give you a taste of the sweet red Cherries all the way from the north whereas the blueberries bring their sweet-tart taste from their Southern American origin. Enjoy them while they are still in season.

all-fruits.name: Kimaye Litchi(500g)
all-fruits.description: The perfect cherry is rounded with a slight heart shape and dimple at its stem end. The skin is thin with a deep red color and a brilliant sheen. Cherry's flavor is sweet and pleasantly tarty, mimicking notes of currant, plum, raspberry and blackberry.

all-fruits.name: Kimaye Jamun (250 gm)
all-fruits.description: Jamun are oblong shaped berries with a dark red to dark black colored skin with starkly contrasting pinkish- white flesh. The flesh is extremely juicy and has a flavor that combines sweet and tart with a slightly astringent aftertaste. The dark-colored skin leaves a stain on the lips and mouth that can last for several hours.

all-fruits.name: Kimaye Sharad - Flame Grapes Combo
all-fruits.description: This combo is a combination of two of our sweetest grapes. Straight from the farms of Nashik. Each grape meets the Kimaye safety and quality standards.

all-fruits.name: Kimaye Cherries (Indian) (250g)
all-fruits.description: The perfect cherry is rounded with a slight heart shape and dimple at its stem end. The skin is thin with a deep red color and a brilliant sheen. Cherry's flavor is sweet and pleasantly tarty, mimicking notes of currant, plum, raspberry and blackberry.

all-fruits.name: Kimaye Honeydew Melon (1 pc)
all-fruits.description: Honeydew melons are small to medium fruits, the rind develops a waxy, velvety surface with a slightly sticky consistency, Underneath the surface, the flesh appears in shades of pale green or white green hues, depending on the variety, and thickness, density. Honeydew melons emit a faint, sweet aroma and will feel heavy for their size, yielding under gentle pressure around the blossom end when ripe. The melons contain approximately 16 Brix, a measurement of sugar levels within the flesh, contributing to the melon’s delicate, sweet, floral, and subtly fruity flavor.

all-fruits.name: Kimaye Apricots (Pack of 250g & 500g)
all-fruits.description: Apricots are stone fruits, characterized by their thin skin, pulpy middle, and a hard central shell enclosing a pit. They have a smooth and velvety outer skin with a rosy blush, and can range in color from pale yellow to golden, depending on how ripe they are. The flesh is juicy and sweet. The taste is often a mix of peach and plum. .

all-fruits.name: Kimaye Muskmelon (1 pc)
all-fruits.description: Kesar is an intensely sweet mango that cannot fail to be satisfying, and flavorsome. Often known as Gir Kesar, grown in a specific region around Gir forest is popularly known to have been the favorite of the Nawabs from Junagadh.Each Kimaye Kesar mango goes through carbide-free ripening process, is traceable to it's farmer and source and comes with a minimum guaranteed weight and size.

all-fruits.name: Kimaye Peach (250g )
all-fruits.description: Peaches are round fruits that range in size from 5 to 9 centimeters in diameter. They are distinguished by a downy fuzz covering their thin skins. The fruits mature from green to yellow and then orange with deep red blushing on the side facing the sun. The deep orange flesh is aromatic and juicy and may or may not cling to the hard, almond-shaped central stone. Peaches offer a sweet flavor, balancing sugar and acid for a well-rounded flavor.

fruit-combos.name: Kimaye Litchi-Kesar Combo
fruit-combos.description: Kesar is an intensely sweet mango that cannot fail to be satisfying, and flavorsome. Often known as Gir Kesar, grown in a specific region around Gir forest. While the juicy litchis are are sweet, juicy, and robust. This sweet and super juicy combo is just what your palette needs.

fruit-combos.name: Kimaye Cherry- Blueberry Combo
fruit-combos.description: What do you call a Combo which has both Blueberries and Cherries? Delicious right? This combo is a mix of two of our personal favourites and Kimaye Cherries and Blueberries. This is sure to give you a taste of the sweet red Cherries all the way from the north whereas the blueberries bring their sweet-tart taste from their Southern American origin. Enjoy them while they are still in season.

fruit-combos.name: Kimaye Litchi -Peach Combo
fruit-combos.description: The Kimaye Litchi-Peach Combo is a juicy combination that is power packed with nutrition and taste.While the Litchi is sweet and juicy, Peaches balance it off with their subtly sweet flavour and adds a floral aroma on biting into it.

fresh-cuts.name: Pomegranate Seeds (Arils Cup)125g
fresh-cuts.description: Kimaye Arils are non-frozen, non-dried, fresh Pomegranate seeds. Pop open the cup to enjoy arils as fresh as a pomegranate opened at your home.

fresh-cuts.name: Coconut Chunks Cup (100g)
fresh-cuts.description: Kimaye Coconut Chunks are fresh coconut cubes extracted from mature coconuts. A perfect replacement for your on-the-go snack.

fresh-cuts.name: Grated Coconut Punnet
fresh-cuts.description: Kimaye freshly grated coconut is as fresh as it could be. Avoid the hassle of grating coconut in your kitchen! You can use this to make chutneys, use for curries or garnishing.

fresh-cuts.name: Kimaye Arils-Coco Cup (125g)
fresh-cuts.description: A perfect blend of red and white, Kimaye Arils-Coco Cup contains Arils and Grated Coconut. Kimaye Arils are non-frozen, non-dried, fresh pomegranate seeds. Kimaye freshly grated coconut is as fresh as it could be. Forget the hassle of peeling pomegranates or grating coconut in your kitchen, coz' we got you covered with this yummy ready to eat treat!
